caption.center: THE PEOPLE, ETC., respondent, v. RICK SAMMS, a/k/a RICKY WALKER,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Second Department.

opinion.posture: Appeal by the defendant, as limited by his motion, from an amended sentence of the Supreme Court, Queens County (Fisher, J.), imposed October 11, 2000, on the ground that the amended sentence is excessive.
opinion.attorneys:
Andrew C. Fine, New York, N.Y. (Katheryne M. Martone of counsel), for appellant.
Richard A. Brown, District Attorney, Kew Gardens, N.Y. (John M. Castellano and Donna Aldea of counsel; Lorrie A. Zinno on the brief), for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before: A. GAIL PRUDENTI, P.J., DAVID S. RITTER, SANDRA L. TOWNES, REINALDO E. RIVERA, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
DECISION ORDER ORDERED that the amended sentence is affirmed.
No opinion.
PRUDENTI, P.J., RITTER, TOWNES and RIVERA, JJ., concur.
